translation.aboutme: I’m passionate about programming and technology, with experience in frontend and backend development using {{tech}}. My main interests are creating {{webTechnologies}}, exploring {{blockchain}}, and building {{products}}.
translation.work: I am currently employed as a Senior Software Developer at Everon.
translation.freelance: I am always open to freelance opportunities or collaborations with innovative companies. Let’s connect!
translation.graduation: I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Federal Institute of Santa Catarina, Campus Videira - SC.
translation.someActivities: Some other activities that I love to do!
translation.talk: Chatting with my friends and having a beer!
translation.brewer: I am an enthusiast and amateur craft beer brewer.
translation.phrase: Great solutions come from combining passion with curiosity. I strive to create technology that simplifies lives and drives meaningful impact.
